name: CITIZENS NATIONAL BANK & TRUST CO., Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania
name_abbreviation: Citizens National Bank & Trust Co. v. Commonwealth

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: CITIZENS NATIONAL BANK & TRUST CO., Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order, 63 Pa.Cmwlth. 383, 437 A.2d 1327, affirmed.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Edward T. Baker, Harrisburg, Alphonsus R. Romeika, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Vincent J. Dopko, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
460 A.2d 754
CITIZENS NATIONAL BANK & TRUST CO., Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 23, 1983.
Decided May 31, 1983.
Edward T. Baker, Harrisburg, Alphonsus R. Romeika, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Vincent J. Dopko, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
